text: 4.2 Apo 20.20, 20.31, 1 Ti 4.13, 5.20, Tat 1.13, 2.15 God takaw teplep ak kɨles gɨl agñɨnɨmɨn. Binɨb okok kɨlop tep gɨnɨgab akaŋ, tep ma gɨnɨgab agɨl yɨlɨk ma nɨgɨnɨmɨn, takaw ak mɨnek mɨnek agñɨnɨmɨn. Binɨb God nɨgtep gɨlaŋ agɨl, kɨlop tɨmud wukɨlɨg, kɨles gɨl agñɨ tep gɨlɨg yenɨmɨn. Pen pel kɨmɨgel jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl, God gos ne ak agtep gɨl agñɨnɨmɨn.
